general_informations_text:
title|An affordable contest application for all participants
subtitle|A friendly and fair gaming platform
text|Our contest application has been designed to provide a friendly and fair gaming experience for all participants. We have put in place an affordable pricing system to allow everyone to participate in contests, while offering attractive rewards for the winners.
subtitle|A wide variety of contests
text|We offer a wide range competitions to suit all tastes and skill levels. From puzzle challenges to games of chance and games of skill, our contests offer a diverse and fun gaming experience for all players.
subtitle|Clear and transparent rules
text|We place great importance on the transparency and fairness in all our contests. The rules and conditions of each contest are clearly explained, and the winners are chosen randomly and impartially. We also have security measures in place to ensure that all financial transactions are safe and secure.
subtitle|An affordable platform for everyone
text|Our app has been designed to provide affordable contests for all participants. We have implemented an affordable pricing system to allow everyone to participate in contests, without having to spend a lot of money.
subtitle|Attractive rewards for winners
text|We offer attractive rewards for the winners of our contests. Participants have the opportunity to win attractive prizes, while enjoying a fun and fair gaming experience.
text|In summary, our app offers an affordable, user-friendly and fair gaming platform for all participants. With our wide range of contests, clear and transparent rules and attractive rewards for winners, we are confident that our platform will bring joy and excitement to anyone looking to play and win.
